title: Grayson the BULLY Frog with Ted and Raymond
description: (Bedtime Stories For Kids Ages 4-8): Short Stories for Kids, Bullying, Bedtime Stories For Kids, Children Books, frogs, bullying books, social skillsDo you know a BULLY? Has your child been bullied? Do you believe these books should be in every library around the globe? Come take a look. PLEASE help me and other authors take a STAND against bullies. Grayson, the BULLY frog, bullies on Ted, Raymond's best friend. Ted gets upset because he was bullied and Raymond stood beside and did nothing. Take a look at this book and see how it made Ted feel.
author: Rhonda Patton
